allow.description: Identifier names for which shadowing is allowed.

builtinGlobals.description: Whether to report shadowing of built-in global variables.

hoist.description: Whether to report shadowing before outer functions or variables are defined.

ignoreFunctionTypeParameterNameValueShad.description: Whether to ignore function parameters named the same as a variable.

ignoreOnInitialization.description: Whether to ignore the variable initializers when the shadowed variable is presumably still unitialized.

ignoreTypeValueShadow.description: Whether to ignore types named the same as a variable.
